name: RTCRtpTransceiver.stopped
description: The read-only stopped property on the RTCRtpTransceiver interface indicates whether or not the transceiver's associated sender and receiver have both been stopped.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
refs.description: The definition of 'RTCRtpTransceiver.stopped' in the 'WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers' specification.
